analysis.claim_text: At eighteen, on the run in Tasmania, he met the escaped convict Ayrton hiding in the bush; the two fugitives pooled their languages and survival skills, raided together for ransom and forged a brotherhood laced with mutual wariness.

sub_claims.text: At eighteen, on the run in Tasmania, he met the escaped convict Ayrton hiding in the bush; the two fugitives pooled their languages and survival skills, raided together for ransom and forged a brotherhood laced with mutual wariness.
Kai-Koumou was on the run in Tasmania at eighteen.
Kai-Koumou met Ayrton while both were hiding in the bush.
Kai-Koumou and Ayrton pooled their languages and survival skills.

This contradicts the claim that Kai-Koumou and Glenarvan formed a brotherhood laced with mutual wariness based on their shared desire to ransom Tohonga.
